attributes.action: Ban all disposable barbecues from sale in the U.K
attributes.additional_details: The climate changes we see are already happening too fast for a lot of wildlife to adapt to, not only due to diminishing habitats, but also due to indigenous species migrating around the country and becoming predators to native species where there were none before.Wildfires have devastating effects, further destroying habitats. We have a responsibility not to add to it.
attributes.background: Place an outright ban on all disposable barbecues, especially those using tin foil containers, in order to dramatically lessen the chance of wildfires occurring.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726390
